import React from 'react'; import './gameBoard.css' class Table extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ counter: 0, image: "./imagies/joker-white.jpg" } } changeForBatman = () =>{ if ( this.state.image ==="./imagies/joker-white.jpg"){ this.setState({ image: "./imagies/batman-black.jpg", counter: this.state.counter +1 }) }else { console.log("Karta juz zostala odwrocona ") } } render(){ console.log(this.state.counter) return ( this.changeForBatman()} alt ="x"/> ) } } class Game extends React.Component{ render(){ return (
) } } export default Game;
